Hey everyone!

MXroute is an email hosting provider that aims to keep it simple, while offering high quality delivery standards. If your email has any chance of hitting the inbox, we'll get it there. Here are some features of MXroute:

- IMAP, SMTP, POP3  
- Roundcube, Squirrelmail, Horde  
- cPanel control (<a href="https://billing.mxroute.com/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=12">why?</a>)  
- MailChannels for outgoing filtering / high quality delivery  
- Servers physically overseen in a local datacenter  
- Spammy neighbors have no impact on your quality of service  
- RAID10 storage to reduce impact of single drive failure  
- Off-site backups made daily
